translations: v.预先录制（prerecord 的过去式及过去分词）

phrs.translation: 被预先录制的, 预先录制的, 预录的
预录磁带, 预录带, 翻译, 预记录带英语
预先录制的, 预先录好的

sentences.sentence: Perform it live, then give her a prerecorded version.
sentences.translation: 为母亲深情的演唱一遍，然后送给她预先录制好的光盘。

sentences.sentence: BubbleTweet also lets users upload prerecorded video content.
sentences.translation: BubbleT weet也允许用户上传事先录制好的视频的内容。

sentences.sentence: Out of the plastic stereo headsets you can hear a little hum of prerecorded music.
sentences.translation: 劣质的塑料耳机还在哼着航空公司预先录制的曲子。
